name: Dreamsect // Rebel Saga // Episode 1: Days of Innocence DEMO
name_original: Dreamsect // Rebel Saga // Episode 1: Days of Innocence DEMO
description:
First demo of  Days of Innocence. Includes  Chapter 1 and an extra story. 

This is a world inhabited those called "Paranormals" and "Casuals." After a millennia-long hostility between the two escalates into an all-out war, the future of the world falls to the hands of those who seek  the "truth" and "justice."

Please be aware that this is a kinetic visual novel,  and contains no traditional gameplay. The characters are bound by their own actions and circumstances, and as such, all you can do is simply watch as their story unfolds.
